name: Buneary

evolution.description: Buneary can evolve into Lopunny at level 7 and above if its Loyalty level is +2 or higher. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 9 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Rabbit Pokémon. It slams foes by sharply uncoiling its rolled ears. It stings enough to make a grown-up cry in pain.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be the target of an attack of opportunity.

abilities.name: Klutz
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot hold an item.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to being paralyzed.
